nodes.bodyText:
@EricWittmann Github Actions doesn't support interactive mode yet and bash cannot allocate a tty. Hence, It will fail with the error the input device is not a TTY. If we need an interactive terminal and aren't running in a terminal on Linux or macOS, we need to use a different command-line interface. PowerShell is reported to include this support on Windows.
The simplest solution would be to remove the -it option from the docker run command to make it non-interactive and remove the TTY
